name: MageVu
description:
This is game created for the Mad Game Jam 2021, where the theme was "DejaVu".

You are a mage in a bad player's party... He keeps using only the same spell! DejaVu!

You have already  seen the attack that is coming,  so just summon elemental shields to defend your party from elemetal attacks! Memorize the attacks and keep helping your party!

- Use QWER to select an element;
- Right click to add a shield, Left click to remove a shield;
- You have to summon all shields to play the turn!
- Hero looses 20 hp if no shield, 10 hp if wrong elemental shield and 0 if correct elemental shield. 
- Heroes have 100hp. If you dies, you loose!
- No matter how many times you try, you can never change the spell selected by the player

If you have a QUDO Gamer account, there is a bonus :)

Tutorial InGame

Code, GameDesign, Sound Effects and Musics created by me.
Visuals assets are not, but licensed.
